comments.text: The close command (cmd/bw/close.go:64) currently prints: closed <id>: <title>. Update it to render the title with Unicode combining strikethrough (U+0336) so the title appears struck through, e.g. closed bw-6ad: T̶i̶t̶l̶e̶ ̶t̶e̶x̶t̶. This gives a visual cue that the issue is done.

title: Use ASCII strikethrough for title in close command output
